metadata.title: CVE-2022-29536 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In GNOME Epiphany before 41.4 and 42.x before 42.2, an HTML document can trigger a client buffer overflow (in ephy_string_shorten in the UI process) via a long page title. The issue occurs because the number of bytes for a UTF-8 ellipsis character is not properly considered.

criterions.comment: epiphany-browser package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
